alert.note: Alert for Avery; Mitchell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:09PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mitchell, southwestern Avery and northwestern Burke Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Spruce Pine, or near Bakersville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newland, Spruce Pine, Elk Park, Bakersville, Crossnore, Linville Falls, B.R. Parkway-Linville Falls To Grandfather, Buladean, Bandana and Ingalls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
